reviewText: I agree that the regular price is high.  But it does give people a good taste of the Son-Rise Program, which has helped many families I personally know of to help their children recover from autism.  It's a small price to pay to find out if this is the right program for you.

just would like people to be aware that this dvd for the price it is being offered at is unfair, it is a very short dvd and not a lot of information is giving, so if you are a parent or a teacher, the dvd is not worth the price.
